title: Part A
stimulusHtml:
1 point is earned for difference quotient

1 point is earned for answer with units

H ′ (10)= H(12)−H(8) 12−8 = 80−73 4 = 7 4 °C/min MathType@MTEF@5@5@@53D2@
descriptions:
The student response earns none of the following points:

1 point is earned for difference quotient

1 point is earned for answer with units

H ′ (10)= H(12)−H(8) 12−8 = 80−73 4 = 7 4 °C/min MathType@MTEF@5@5@@53D2@

The student response earns one of the following points:

1 point is earned for difference quotient

1 point is earned for answer with units

H ′ (10)= H(12)−H(8) 12−8 = 80−73 4 = 7 4 °C/min MathType@MTEF@5@5@@53D2@

The student response earns all of the following points:

1 point is earned for difference quotient

1 point is earned for answer with units

H ′ (10)= H(12)−H(8) 12−8 = 80−73 4 = 7 4 °C/min MathType@MTEF@5@5@@53D2@
